marklogic.body: I think that Smyly has one more start, Oliver got sent down, and this was Below's last shot. At the risk of sounding hokey, it looks like it is Drew's to lose. Of course, They could opt to have them all get one more start in the Minors after the season starts. With the way the schedule works, they won't need a 5th starter until mid April. I agree that Dirks has been much better than Thomas. Marte is more of a strikeout pitcher than Villarreal is, but Brayan has a few months more of experience. I was Glad to see him improve, so far, over the way he was last year. Given that it is the last bullpen Spot, I could live with either one.
